name: browserhive

//dependencies.@grpc/grpc-js: Pure JavaScript gRPC implementation for Node.js.
//dependencies.@grpc/proto-loader: Used for gRPC reflection service (grpcurl support).
//dependencies.@grpc/reflection: gRPC reflection API for runtime service discovery.

//devDependencies.@bufbuild/buf: Buf CLI for Protocol Buffer compilation and code generation. Used by npm run proto:generate.

//devDependencies.@types/json-schema: Required for TypeScript type resolution. Transitive dependency from @eslint/core.
//devDependencies.@types/node: Required for TypeScript type resolution. Transitive dependency from vitest and vite.
//devDependencies.@types/yauzl: Required for TypeScript type resolution. Transitive dependency from puppeteer via extract-zip.
